settings.label: Enter your license key
settings.info: Put here your unique license key number that you received by email to activate your theme. If you put a duplicated license key number, the theme won't be activated. To transfer a license key to another store, please contact support@boostertheme.com

settings.content: Homepage Slideshow and Image with text overlay section Buttons

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting]({{ site.url }}/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Popup is Showing After
settings.info: The Discount Popup will show up only if the customer didn't add anything to cart on your store after X minutes or want to exit the site

settings.label: Cookie expiration time
settings.info: The number of days before showing again the discount Popup to your visitor

settings.label: Enable in mobile [Not Recommended to enable sale notification in Mobile]
KLAVIYO
settings.info: Please copy the hidden input[name='g'] value from the KLAVIYO form and paste here.

settings.label: Disable the free item ($0) in search page
Enable product second image on image hover
Timer disable using product tag
settings.info: Disable the timer from certain product by using product tag: no-timer

settings.label: Timer Type
settings.info: Random : Randomly show up a different time on every products (Cookie based). Evergreen : Time will reset everyday at the time you choose. Custom : Choose the amount of time left and show up the same timer on every products (Cookie based). Timer with inventory: Custom minutes and inventory based left number (Cookie based).

settings.label: Enable timer for custom seconds
settings.info: Example: 1500 second left = 25 minutes left. Note that the max second limit is 359999.

settings.label: Stock left
settings.info: Random : Randomly display a different amount left for every product (Cookie based). Real time inventory : Display the real amount left in stock from your Shopify products inventory. Inventory Reducer : Start reducing the amount left in stock from your Shopify products inventory. (Cookie based)

settings.label: Image
settings.info: Shown when sharing a link on social media. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) about image thumbnails.
